Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? Coming at this time
of day, you must really want to see me!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're so sweet, <MYNAME>. It's
really very cute! Come on, get over
here.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know what I'm doing? Just
checking some hair wax that I ordered.
<PAGE>
I've only given it a quick look over,
but it seems much better than the old
stuff.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, I know. Why don't you give this
hair wax a try, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great. Step into my office of style!

Allen has been quiet for a while. Do you
want to try saying something?
How's work going?
I like it when you touch my hair.
Any reason for the silence?
Say nothing, just look at Allen.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's work? Yeah, not bad. I'm doing
better than your farm!
<PAGE>
Forget that, anyway. Your hair, <MYNAME>!
You obviously don't take care of it at
all!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You've got a stylist for a boyfriend,
so you need to pay a little more
attention to your hair!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Boy, I can't believe you. Okay, once I
get the wax off I'll also give your hair
a special treatment.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Talk about working overtime! Look after
your hair from now on, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're all done, anyway. Time to close
up shop! Goodnight, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It feels good?
<PAGE>
That's because I've got the magic
fingers! Or perhaps its because of your
feelings for me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Both, is it! It sure feels great to have
my cute girlfriend say things like that
to me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I enjoy working with your hair as well.
It feels so good to style!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, I'm done, my Princess. If you
want me to touch your hair again, come
back any time!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're all done, anyway. Time to close
up shop! Goodnight, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yeah. That's because, my dear <MYNAME>,
your hair has been so badly mistreated
I'm at a loss for words!
<PAGE>
Hair is the life of a woman! You're a
failure as the girlfriend of a stylist!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Boy, I can't believe you. Okay, once I
get the wax off I'll also give your hair
a special treatment.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Talk about working overtime! Look after
your hair from now on, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're all done, anyway. Time to close
up shop! Goodnight, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? You're fascinated by
how cool I look while I'm working?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're so much fun, <MYNAME>! You get so
petulant so easily, it just makes me
want to tease you all the time!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm just kidding! To tell you the truth,
I was quiet because I'm a little
nervous. Can you forgive me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Nervous might not be the right word.
Touching your hair just feels so good,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Do you like it when I'm styling your
hair?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm glad to hear it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
There, I'm done, my Princess. Let me
style your hair again soon!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right. Time to close up shop! Goodnight,
<MYNAME>.
